text: ITV Encore was a television channel which broadcasted in the United Kingdom. The channel was available exclusively available on Sky Go. It was launched on 9 June 2014 and closed on 1 May 2018. == References and Identies == On 1st May 2018, The channel Was closed & Replace ITV4 Plus. â€¢ And Witch Gold Happens... And ITVX Launched on 15 Nov 2022, ITV Hub Closure CHANNELS!! From The FAST Channel Comedy Central on 10th January 2019. Category:ITV (TV network) Category:British television channels
title: ITV Encore
